documentation.text: @dev Lets a contract admin set the URI for contract-level metadata.
@dev Returns whether contract metadata can be set in the given execution context.

Thirdweb's `ContractMetadata` is a contract extension for any base contracts. It lets you set a metadata URI
  for you contract.
  Additionally, `ContractMetadata` is necessary for NFT contracts that want royalties to get distributed on OpenSea.
@dev Returns the metadata URI of the contract.

@dev Sets contract URI for the storefront-level metadata of the contract.
       Only module admin can call this function.
@dev Emitted when the contract URI is updated.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The deadline should be a date in the future."

arguments.value: The deadline should be a date in the future.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The deadline should be a date in the future."

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct CrowdFunding.Campaign memory[] memory)
